Author: OverwhelmedAdenium
Text: I totally agree! It’s bad when I’m told that I’m getting bigger, as well as when I’m told I’m getting skinnier. It’s like I can never win mentally. Thank you, I’ll look into that!

Author: imnevergold
Text: I'm so sorry to hear that your husband wasn't supportive when you tried to talk to him. I would recommend going on subs like r/xxfitness to try to see how others are losing weight in a healthy way. If you can, try to see a therapist as well. It's easy to continue disordered eating habits when you're overweight and losing weight because people will encourage your weight loss.
